subject: Re: [syzbot] [cgroups?] [mm?] KASAN: wild-memory-access Read in lookup_swap_cgroup_id (2)

reviews.author: Dmitry Vyukov
reviews.summary: Dmitry Vyukov suspects the KASAN wild-memory-access bug to be caused by a tricky race condition rather than previous corruption, pointing out similarities in reports and access addresses.

reviews.author: Shakeel Butt
reviews.summary: Shakeel Butt thanked the reporter for bringing up the issue and expressed a desire to dig deeper, but did not provide any specific technical feedback or concerns.

reviews.author: Kairui Song
reviews.summary: Reviewer Kairui Song raised concerns about a potential issue with invalid swap entries causing wild-memory-access in lookup_swap_cgroup_id.
sentiment_signals: requested additional investigation into the cause of the error
